column1: CNN @realDonaldTrump I’m going to predict USA Coronavirus death count will hit 100,000. I see no significant slowdown.

Honestly neh this corona virus is so invincible, that constantly reading and hearing about it just seems so unreal . One think I and we all need the most is freedom, that is also essential. Corona virus should definitely be kicked out... Lord Have Mercy !
DavidL In the news at 11am - Bank BIC reassures on dos Santos fears, majority of SA health professionals opposed to NHI, and China warns of possible new strain of coronavirus.

So next too the #Coronavirus we now also have the #Birdflu in China. What are they doing there?
